Sir Adabol Remastered

by Mojon Twins

Released Feb 1, 2016
Players 1
Tags platformer
License GPLv3

Download ROM (sha-1: 5df956b9785fdff64273de39556358351d1f47d9)

Play now

Description

Control Sir Ababol accross the Monegrian fields and gather 24 ababol flowers. To be able to progress in your journey you'll need some keys you will be able to use to open several doors to gain access to different sections. You can jump on the baddies to get rid of them, too. Be patient, think before you jump, and you'll be successful!
